name: Cufflinks: Sterling Silver and Black resin
description:
* * * * If you like the Cufflink styles in Natonia Pickup Jewellery, but prefer a different colour, then check out the other colours used in this shop. and let me know - you can have your very own personalised item of jewellery!!

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - 

Hand fabricated sterling silver cuflinks are filled with hand pigmented black resin with sterling silver dots. A matt and very smooth finish is given to resin. 

Such a modern, clean design for the cuff of your shirt! 

The shape is forged freehand in my work studio, so yours may differ very slightly to this. Very stylish and great for every occasion! .......Wedding, Groomsmen, New Job, Graduation, Retirement..... 

Cufflink size- 
Width: approx' 1.5cm at widest part. 
Depth: 3mm approx' 

All metal components are sterling silver. 

***Cufflinks will be shipped 10 working days after payment is cleared, thanks. 

♥ ♥ ♥ 

A non-toxic resin is used which is water tight, but it is still better to take off items before washing, showering etc. Total submersion not recommended and may cause damage. 


All Items and Images © 2010-2011 Natonia A Pickup, All Rights Reserved.

categories.name: C u f f l i n k s

name: Leaves on a Branch in sterling silver
description:
Chic, modern and just elegant. Can be worn for special occasion or everyday wear. 

Also a great Mothers Day or Valentines gift! 

These beautiful leaves are all sawn out from silver sheet by hand on my workbench in my studio, then finished with a brushed effect. It stands out a treat! 

The leaves pendant hangs from an 18" sterling silver chain. If you require a different length then please let me know and I'll get back to you. 

Pendant size is: 
approx 5cm across. 
approx 3cm in height. 


♥ ♥ ♥

categories.name: N e c k l a c e

name: Sterling Silver and Turquoise Round Earrings
description:
Modern blocks of matte turquoise coloured resin are inlaid into round sterling silver hoops. This colour is beautiful! They look fab, stand out, very stylish and great for every occasion! 

The outside sterling silver sides have been oxidised and ear wire, the fronts have kept their silver sparkle - great contrast. 

Earring size- 
Width: approx' 1.8cm 
Length from tip of hook to bottom approx' 3.5cm 
Depth: 4mm approx' 

Ear wires are sterling silver also. 
Ear wires can be left with their silver shine, if so leave me a message. 

The resin is coloured and mixed by hand each time, so I will do my best to achieve the same colour, there may be a degree of difference, therefore very unique! 

***Made To Order - Earrings will be shipped 10 working days after payment is cleared, thanks. 

♥ ♥ ♥ 

A non-toxic resin is used which is water tight, but it is still better to take off jewellery before washing, showering etc. Total submersion not recommended and may cause damage.

name: Yellow & Grey Ruggedy Rounds in sterling silver
description:
Modern blocks of matte colour are inlaid into 2 round(ish) sterling silver hoops, with gorgeously long earwires. They look fab, stand out, very stylish and great for every occasion! 

The outside sterling silver sides have been oxidised, the fronts have kept their silver sparkle - great contrast. 

Earring size- 
Width: approx' 1cm 
Length from tip of hook to bottom approx' 6cm 

Thickness 3mm 
Ear wires are sterling silver also. 

The resin is coloured and mixed by hand each time, so I will do my best to achieve the same colour, there may be a degree of difference, therefore very unique! 

***Earrings will be shipped 10 working days after payment is cleared, thanks. 

♥ ♥ ♥ 

A non-toxic resin is used which is water tight, but it is still better to take off jewellery before washing, showering etc. Total submersion not recommended and may cause damage.

categories.name: E a r r i n g s

name: Sterling Silver Blackened Brooch - Mint & Custard
description:
Mint and Custard coloured resin have been set into bezels on this sterling silver brooch. This modern brooch has been oxidised to a dark grey/black and a subtle hand-stitched doodle accompanies the colour blocks. The silver has been bought back to a shine around the stunning colours and the edges of the brooch itself - this is a beautiful contrast. I love this brooch, the irregular shape, the way it is hand formed on my workbench and a small piece of sculptural art to adorn your blazer, scarf, jacket ........anything you wear! 
This is truly one of a kind, as every one I create will be slightly different, made with my two hands. 

A sterling silver pin and catch give this added security, suitable for most fabrics. 

Size: 
Width: 5cm 
Height: 2.cm 
Depth 4mm 

***Brooch will be shipped 10 working days after payment is cleared, thanks. 

♥ ♥ ♥ 

A non-toxic resin is used which is water tight, but it is still better to take off jewellery before washing, showering etc. Total submersion not recommended and may cause damage.
